instructionsFor.edit: Edit 1439563175.000062: [new message] --- I find the message in the public room with the given timestamp, and change its text.
instructionsFor.delete: Delete 1439563175.000062: --- I find the message in the public room with the given timestamp, and delete it.
instructionsFor.remindme: Remindme */5_*_*_*_*_*: [message] --- I post to the room (or direct message conversation) according to the given Cron schedule. See how to write Crons here: http://crontab-generator.org . Instead of 5 fields, I accept 6, beginning with seconds. The example here means 'every 5 seconds'. Only instructors can make reminders for groups.
instructionsFor.allreminders: Allreminders: --- I show all reminders for the current room (or DM conversation).
instructionsFor.stopreminder: Stopreminder 3: --- I stop the reminder with the given ID. Only instructors can stop reminders for groups.
instructionsFor.anon: Anon: --- I send an anonymous message to the group.
instructionsFor.instructors: Instructors: --- I send a *not* anonymous *private* message to each of the instructors. Mentioning *@instructors* in the main group does the same.

blurbs.hello:
Hi there! Give me commands by direct messaging me with the command followed by ':'. For example, to see the 'help' menu, you'd direct message me with:

Help:
blurbs.atmention: @mentioning me doesn't do anything. Please direct message me!
